tidbits.title: Vast Steppes and Nomadic Culture
tidbits.description: Mongolia is known for its vast steppes, nomadic herding traditions, and the iconic Gobi Desert, offering a rugged and diverse landscape.

tidbits.title: Rich History and Genghis Khan
tidbits.description: The country has a rich history, including the legacy of Genghis Khan, and is home to ancient monasteries, temples, and archaeological sites.

tidbits.title: Naadam Festival
tidbits.description: The Naadam Festival celebrates Mongolian culture with traditional sports like wrestling, horse racing, and archery, showcasing national pride.
